snippet: The new Rick Ross mixtape, “Rich Forever,” features cameos by numerous artists, including Nas, Drake, Styles P, Pharrell, French Montana, 2 Chainz and Diddy.
abstract: Jon Caramanica Critic's Notebook on hip-hop artist Rick Ross's new mixtape Rich Forever, which features cameo performances by many other hip-hop stars.
lead_paragraph: The new Rick Ross mixtape, “Rich Forever,” features cameos by numerous artists, including Nas, Drake, Styles P, Pharrell, French Montana, 2 Chainz and Diddy.

headline.seo: Rick Ross’s ‘Rich Forever’ Brims With Cameos
headline.main: Rap Cameos That Pack Some Electric Punches
headline.print_headline: Rap Cameos That Pack Some Electric Punches
